node.message_en: Thank you everyone for the participation, our first round of Call for Volunteers has been closed.
node.message_zh: 我們正招募有經驗的速記員及資料整合員，以跟進疫情最新動態。如有興趣請於此報名。

node.message_en: (Chinese Only) The article "不是數字，是人命 — 武漢肺炎香港病逝者的記錄" from The Stand News restores the story and details behind each case number, as every of them is more than just a figure on some charts.
node.message_zh: 由立場新聞所撰寫的《不是數字，是人命 — 武漢肺炎香港病逝者的記錄》，是疫症底下一個個病逝者的故事。
